### 🩸 CrampCast™: Symptom Severity

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

symptoms <- data.frame(
  symptom = c("Cramps", "Mood Swings", "Bloating"),
  severity = c(8, 7, 6)
)

renderPlot({
  ggplot(symptoms, aes(x = symptom, y = severity, fill = symptom)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
    ylim(0, 10) +
    labs(title = "CrampCast™ Severity Forecast", y = "Severity (Satirical Units)") +
    theme_minimal()
})
```

Satirical caption: _“70% chance of irrational rage. Forecast issued by the Uterus Weather Bureau.”_

### MoodSwingMeter™

```{r}
mood_index <- sample(1:10, 1)
renderGauge({
  flexdashboard::gauge(
    mood_index, min = 1, max = 10,
    sectors = flexdashboard::gaugeSectors(success = 1:3, warning = 4:7, danger = 8:10)
  )
})
```

Satirical caption: _“Mood swings may disrupt service. Please remain seated.”_
